unnormalised: My grandmother, Amma, swears by Ayurveda. She's 80 years old and attributes her health to regular treatments. Last Onam, after eating copious amounts of payasam, she felt heavy. A quick trip to the Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala in Kerala for a Panchakarma detox set her right as rain. She says it's better than any doctor in Mumbai! The doshas must be balanced, she always says, especially after biryani feasts!
